questions.question: What is this app for?
questions.answer: This app is designed to manage employee information, recognize employee achievements, and facilitate positive feedback within an organization.

questions.question: Who can use this app?
questions.answer: The app can be used by HR managers, team leaders, and employees within an organization.

questions.question: How do I log in to the app?
questions.answer: You can log in using your registered email and password. If you are a new employee, you'll receive an email with a temporary password that you can change upon first login.

questions.question: How can I add a new employee?
questions.answer: You can add a new employee by filling out the form under the "Add Employee" section. Ensure you provide all required fields and validate the email format.

questions.question: Can I add multiple employees at once?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upload a CSV file with employee details. Make sure the CSV follows the provided template for successful uploads.

questions.question: What should be included in the CSV file?
questions.answer: The CSV file should include columns for Full Name, Email, Job Title, Department/Unit, Phone, and Employment Date. Only Full Name and Email are mandatory.

questions.question: How do I update an employee’s information?
questions.answer: Navigate to the employee's profile from the employee list, click on the edit button, update the necessary fields, and save the changes.

questions.question: What happens if I enter incorrect information?
questions.answer: If incorrect information is entered, you can edit the employee details to correct it. For any critical errors, please contact the support team.

questions.question: How do I recognize an employee?
questions.answer: Go to the "Recognition" section, select the employee you want to recognize, write a recognition message, and submit it.

questions.question: Can other employees see the recognitions?
questions.answer: Yes, all recognitions are visible to other employees unless set to private by the recognizing person.

questions.question: Can I like a recognition?
questions.answer: Yes, employees can like recognitions to show their appreciation and support.

questions.question: How can I view the recognitions I’ve received?
questions.answer: You can view your recognitions in the "My Recognitions" section under your profile.

questions.question: How can I give feedback?
questions.answer: Navigate to the "Feedback" section, select the recipient, write your feedback, and submit it. Feedback can be anonymous if preferred.

questions.question: Can I view the feedback given to me?
questions.answer: Yes, you can view the feedback given to you in the "My Feedback" section under your profile.

questions.question: Is the feedback anonymous?
questions.answer: Feedback can be anonymous based on the sender's preference.

questions.question: How will I know if I’ve received recognition or feedback?
questions.answer: You will receive email notifications and in-app notifications for any new recognitions or feedback.

questions.question: Can I customize my notification settings?
questions.answer: Yes, you can customize your notification settings in the "Settings" section of your profile.

questions.question: How is my data protected?
questions.answer: Your data is protected using industry-standard encryption and security practices. We prioritize your privacy and data security.

questions.question: Who can see my personal information?
questions.answer: Your personal information is visible to HR managers and relevant team leaders. Other employees can only see information that you choose to make public.

questions.question: How can I reset my password?
questions.answer: You can reset your password by clicking on the "Forgot Password" link on the login page. An email will be sent to you with instructions to reset your password.

questions.question: I didn’t receive my temporary password. What should I do?
questions.answer: Check your spam/junk folder. If you still can’t find the email, contact your HR manager or the support team.

questions.question: The app is not working correctly. What should I do?
questions.answer: Try refreshing the page or clearing your browser cache. If the issue persists, contact the support team with details of the problem.

questions.question: How can I contact support?
questions.answer: You can contact support through the "Help" section in the app or by emailing support@stepps.co.za.
